div.span:
Anime in Japanese: ア ニ メ, is an animation from Japan that is drawn by hand or with computer technology. The word anime stands for "Animation" in English, which refers to animation or illustration.
Launched: 1907 - 1911 (Katsudō Shashin)
Originally from: Jepang
